API module¶

API server of drone manager.

Deal with HTTP requests about drone manger. Build socket for client to get all drones’ info.

class API.User(**kwargs)¶

Bases: flask_sqlalchemy.Model

User class for access control.

generate_auth_token(expiration=600)¶

Generate token for user. Have expriation time in sec.

hash_password(password)¶

Encrypt password.

password_hash¶
username¶
static verify_auth_token(token)¶

Verify token.

Note that invalid token may be expired.

Verify password.

API.assignDrone(*args, **kwargs)¶

Connect and assign a new drone to client.

Returns:function name droneID: assigned droneID for further instuctions.
Return type:function
API.async_mode = 'threading'¶

# async_mode = ‘gevent’ # async_mode = ‘eventlet’ if async_mode == ‘eventlet’:

import eventlet eventlet.monkey_patch()
elif async_mode == ‘gevent’:
from gevent import monkey monkey.patch_all()
API.client_msg(*args, **kwargs)¶

Decrepted.

API.connected_msg(*args, **kwargs)¶

Send connection message and count back to client.

API.getAllDroneInfo(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get all drones infos.

Used for staff admin page.

Returns:function name dict of devices: (droneID: droneinfo_dict)
Return type:function
API.getAllDroneStatus()¶

Get all drones infos.

This is no more an URL In this socket version. Instead, it serves as a thread that keep sending allDroneStatus to the client. The original getAllDroneStatus() become getAllDroneInfo().

Returns(socket data):
function: function name dict of devices: (droneID: droneinfo_dict)
API.getAllDrones(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get all connected drones infomations. Decrepted.

Returns:function name dict of connected drones: (droneID: droneName)
Return type:function
API.getDroneBattery(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get battery percentage of the drone.

Decrepted. Could find in getAllDroneInfo().

Parameters:drone – droneID of the drone.
Returns:function name drone: droneID of the drone. battery: battery in percentage of the drone.
Return type:function
API.getDroneState(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get internal state of the drone.

Decrepted. Could find in getAllDroneInfo().

Parameters:drone – droneID of the drone.
Returns:function name drone: droneID of the drone. state: internal state of the dron in multi-layer dictinary.
Return type:function
API.getPicture(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get the last picture in the drone. If new picture are just taken, it may not get the latest one.

Parameters:drone – droneID of the drone.
Returns:stringIO of the image.
API.get_auth_token(*args, **kwargs)¶

Get token. 600 sec duration.

Returns:generated token duration: 600 sec
Return type:token

API.index(*args, **kwargs)¶

Index of the API server.

API.navigate(*args, **kwargs)¶

Move to the given GPS location.

Form Args:
droneID: drone assigned ID x: latitude y: longitude z: altitude o: orientation mode h: heading
Returns:function name drone: droneID of the drone. state: 0 OK, 1 ERROR, 2 TIMEOUT, others for input error.
Return type:function
API.new_user()¶

Register new user.

Parameters:form with username and password (json) –
Returns:ok with username error with error
Return type:status
API.regainDrone(*args, **kwargs)¶

Regain drone control from the client.

Used when lost connection as well (decrepted, force to reconnect).

Parameters:drone – droneID of the drone.
Returns:function name drone: droneID of the drone. state: if regain drone successfully. False for undefinded drones or other errors.
Return type:function
API.register_page()¶

Register page.

API.releaseAllDevices(*args, **kwargs)¶

Release all drones.

Used when turning off the server. Should make sure all drones are back.

API.searchAllDevices(*args, **kwargs)¶

Search AND connect to all available devices.

Used when boot.

Returns:function name controller_name, d2c_port: controller infomations devicesNum: device number
Return type:function
API.test_connect(*args, **kwargs)¶

Do backgrond thread after connection built.

API.test_login(*args, **kwargs)¶

Used to tets login_required.
